messages.message: Hi! Where can I find instructions to add tracing to a new endpoint? Also, is tracing something we can use in customer environments?
Hey Nidhi, we can use this guide to add tracing to a new endpoint: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1DMNxhIu3py_qZhuSxxOHJLet3jUg_hDkaEhjkQ0XO2c/edit#heading=h.5a4fzv7pk49w
Thanks @Naveen - In the doc it mentions that this is enabled at SC and GS. What is the process to enable it at more customers?
@Nidhi, we have to enable a few environment variables and deploy a few containers from `third-party/docker/jaeger` . I can send you example PRs.
@Nidhi Added info in the document above, please feel free to DM me if you have any questions.
Thanks @Mohit! That will be helpful. Is there any reason we donâ€™t enable it by default in all customer environments?
Good question, also covered in the same document. TLDR-- yes we can but since we use an in-mem database, it would be ideal to wait for customers to have a stable elasticsearch .
Also Nidhi we are revisiting tracing as part observability effort in Q3 - so will keep you posted on customer rollouts/integration.
